11311211221211221.content:
You stare at yourself, confused as to your visage. A few strands of dark hair again fall in front of your eye, and you try to grab at it, but find your fury paw hands inflexible, and almost scratch out your eye. "Punishment or not, I can't go about my daily life with useless paws!!" Your sister sighs, then nods.

"Guess that was an oversight on my part. I guess I'll fix it..." She gestures at you, and you watch the digits on your paws lengthen and narrow, the fur shedding away, revealing normal, albeit petite feminine, human hands, with the notable exception of the fingernails, which still seemed to resemble claws, and when you examined them, you found they would still extend and retract. "..and on second thought, now that I've seen it, I don't like it. The nose has to go." You watch as your dark nose changes it's tone to match your skin, and turns downward a bit, becoming a petite girly nose. "Well, now that I gave you hands you can use, back to my initial question..." You respond to your sister's statement by looking in the mirror again. Outside of the ears, claws, and tail, you do look like a regular beautiful young girl. Speaking of the tail, the act of moving it is both alien and sensual in it's own right.

"I guess I'll take it." You say. "Beats not having a body at all, and it beats just being a head..." She cocked a smile, then a laugh. You loved it, and she knew it, so why were you beating around the bush? Stupid psychic link.

"Well, now that that's out of the way, let's get you changed. You can't run around in an oversized guys T-shirt forever. Let's get you changed." You look down to find your were indeed in the shirt you were wearing when this all started, but it was now too large for your female figure, and you lost your pants in the race to the bathroom.

Going back to your room, you find an armoire where your simple dresser once was, a wardrobe that wasn't there before, and your closet had two doors to it instead of one, but other than that, it was the same room you knew and loved, gaming swag and all intact. Examining the new furniture and closet, you find much of your old clothes there, simply resized for your female frame, and all the pants & shorts modified for someone with a tail. However, you also find new clothes in the mix as well, like all your underwear replaced with panties (also modified for your tail), bras, new t-shirts, tank tops, tube tops, new pants, new shorts, skirts, miniskirts, belts, etc. While the addition of girly clothes was odd, it didn't bother you too much. The one thing that did upset you though was finding your favorite khaki camo cargo shorts had been turned into some kind of camo cargo miniskirt that WASN'T modified for a tail, like the other skirts, meaning raising your tail ever so slightly past practically hanging limp would mean giving everyone a view of your bum and your undies. You sigh. "Guess it's part of my punishment." Throwing it aside, you rummage through and find an outfit to wear for now, a pair of cargo pants, a lime green tank top, and some sandals. You slide on your undies easily enough, remembering to slip your tail in the hole in the rear, and then, after a couple of minutes of fumbling, you manage to figure out and put on the bra. The rest of the clothes are easy enough, and you walk out, to see your sister grinning.

"I loved how frustrated you were by that bra. Fifteen more seconds, and I would have taken pity on you and shown you how to put it on." Suddenly, the phone rings. Your sister jogs down the steps, and you find ourself simultaneously weirded out and unable to look away from sister's now four breasts, the sensation like watching a horrific accident scene. Even though she was now out of your sight, she yells back to you, "Stop staring at my boobs. Remember, I can also see through your eyes now, so no funny business." She picks up the phone, and then yells, "Hey, Joe, it's for you!! It's Walter!!"

Walter was my best friend, also 16, and one of my friends. We are big gamers, and are actually looking to get into a career making them when we get out of college. "He wants to know you still up for that LAN party or are you still PMS'ing?!"

You turn beet red, and yell in a hushed tone, "What the hell, Christy?!"

She takes the phone up, covering the mouth piece, saying, "Remember, I can alter reality now? See, as far as everyone is concerned, I've always been a four-breasted hermaphrodite, and you've always been a catgirl, but otherwise, everything's the same as before. Your friends are no different, nor are mine. They just view you as a lesbian, that's all."

You blush again. "Wha...?!"

"You like girls, don't you?" Christy asks you.

"Yes!!" you exclaim proudly.

"You're now a girl, right?" she continues.

"Uh, I guess..." you respond puzzled.

"Then congratulations. You're a lesbian." she concludes. "Now, I think you've kept Walter waiting long enough." She hands you the phone and goes to the living room to watch TV.

Walter says, "Well, Jo? You still coming?" The big LAN party you had planned last week... Oh boy... "Do I still feel up for it?" You think.

1132221.content:
At first, all you could see and hear was nothing. But then, slowly but surely, you started to regain your senses. Then, as you began to slowly stood back up onto your own two feet, you quickly noticed that noticed was very off about your bedroom; everything in the room was much larger than you remembered.

It was as if you shrunk down to the height of 2 feet 33 inches tall. "Okay, why is everything much bigger?" You said, but as you said those words, you quickly put your hands over your mouth, realizing that something was definitely wrong. But then, you recognized who the voice belonged to; It belonged to none other than the original Rozen Maiden doll herself, Suigintou.

Out of all the anime you watched, the Rozen Maiden series was your favorite, due to how different and unique it was in comparison to any other anime like Dragonball Z and the Gundam franchise, especially since the Rozen Maiden series didn't have the regular anime cliche like giant mechs or hot girls in skimpy outfits.

But the question was this; Why was your voice the same as Suigintou's voice? Then, a thought came to you, as you remembered that you had a full-length mirror in your room. You figured that if your size and voice changed, you needed to see if anything else was changed as well. But as you turned around to face the mirror behind you, what you saw before you as you approached the mirror put you in complete disbelief.

You expected your own original reflection in the mirror, but in it's place was the very being whose voice it belonged to, as you said, "I...I can't believe it. I just not have Suigintou's voice, I've become...no, I AM Suigintou." And boy, you weren't speaking it in a metaphoric statement, you have literally been turned into Suigintou herself. From her pink eyes and silver-white hair, all the way to the very same dark blue outfit she wears in the show, even to those small but very functionable black wings she has, you have become a living replica of Suigintou herself.

"But, this is impossible! Suigintou was only a character in the Rozen Maiden series. How did this happen to me?" You said to yourself, only to hear Suigintou's own voice replacing your original voice. But as you slowly back away from the mirror, you heard the sound of someone slowly clapping their hands. Listening to the slow clapping sound, you turned your head to the left and saw who was making the clapping; none other than your older sister, Christy, as she continued her slow clapping and said, "Bravo, Joey, bravo. Or should I say...Suigintou."

Hearing what your older sister said, you realized something; your transformation into Suigintou was somehow Christy's handiwork. So in response, you raised your head up and looked at her with a pair of angry pink eyes and spoke in Suigintou's voice and replied, "Wait a minute, you did this to me!?!" "Damn straight I did!" Christy answered, as she stopped clapping, looking down at you due to the now obvious height difference between you and her. After all, your sister was about 5 feet 11 inches tall, making her 3 feet 8 inches taller than your current height.

Realizing that your physical transformation into Suigintou was all your sister's handiwork, you became very upset at Christy for what she did to you, as you looked at her with your pink eyes and yelled, "Why?! Why would you do this to me?! I'm your brother!" "Brother my ass! All you've done to me was become an oversized thorn in my side! And since you were into that stupid Rozen Maiden anime so badly, I decided to turn you into one of those stupid dolls, and I'm not changing you back!"

From your new perspective, it sounded like Christy wasn't going to change you back anytime soon. But one question still remained for you; If you're now Suigintou, do you actually have the original Rozen Maiden doll's powers?
1132221.title: Suigintou, The Original Rozen Maiden Doll

choices: Christy gets away from the door, as you destroy the door & chase her
Christy stays and fights you, despite you have a sword & she doesn't
11322211.content:
Although you were now in the body of a 2 foot 3 inch doll from your favorite anime due to your sister's witchcraft, you had an ace up your fancy sleeves; you knew more about the Rozen Maiden series, much better than your own sister. After all, Christy never watched any anime, but she has heard about these anime shows from stealing a few of your magazines and manga books to entertain herself.

Not to mention, Christy was completely unaware of what Suigintou is capable of, especially since she was a very dangerous doll, both in her powers and in a bit of her personality. However, as the saying goes, "You mess with the bull, you get the horns." Or in this case, "You mess with a Rozen Maiden doll named Suigintou, and you're going to have your ass handed to you."

So, as you saw your sister too distracted by her supposed victory over you, you closed your pink eyes and concentrated on the spirit of Suigintou herself, in an attempt to gain access to the original Rozen Maiden's powers. But a few seconds later, you felt a dark essence inside you, as you thought for certain that you were going to turn evil. But then, you felt that familiar power that Suigintou was known for, was you opened your pink eyes and your doll-like lips curled into an evil smirk, making the sadistic look on your face that Suigintou was known for, which basically says, "You have made a grave mistake in crossing me, and you will be dead when I am through with you."

But suddenly, Christy heard a quick flapping sound, causing her to stop gloating, as she quickly looked toward where she last saw you standing at, unaware that you used your small black feathered wings to leap up into the air, as you then landed on the bedpost with both heeled boots, making a loud clack on the wooden post, as you store upon the bedpost with perfect balance, causing Christy to quickly turn her head toward the source of the noise.

But as she turned toward the source of the noise, Christy saw you, standing on the bedpost with perfect grace and balance. However, what gave the novice magic-user a sign of concern was how you managed to jump from the floor to the bedpost and land on top of it with ease.

But then, you looked at your sister with your pink eyes, as you began to chuckle Suigintou's infamous spine-tingling giggle, then spoke to Christy in Suigintou's voice and said, "You thought that the Rozen Maidens were just dolls that were brought to life, didn't you?" Due to how she was becoming more unnerved by the second, Christy could only respond a bit as she asked, "W-What do y-you mean?"

In response, you turn your head away from Christy for a bit, as you let out another spine-tingling giggle that Suigintou was known for, unnerving your sister even more. Then, you looked at the novice magic-user with your pink eyes, holding up a single black feather next to your face, and spoke to Christy in Suigintou's voice and answered, "You see, dear sister, the Rozen Maidens are no mere dolls brought to life by simple magic. They are brought to life with an artificial life force called a Rosa Mystica. In order to increase their powers, a Rozen Maiden requires an intermediary. Or in your case, a medium."

It was from hearing what you told her made Christy realize something; It wasn't just that she physically transformed you into Suigintou, she MADE you into Suigintou. And the worst of it was that Christy just accidentally gave you Suigintou's powers. But then, she saw you gently moved the black feather in your doll hand from left to right, still keeping your pink eyes trained on the nervous Christy, as you then continued speaking and said, "However, unlike the other Rozen Maidens, I, Suigintou, can still have access to my powers, even without the aid of a medium."

But then, you then let go of the black feather in your hand, as it began to levitate by itself. Then, your small feathery black wings grew in wingspan, which allowed you to tap into one of Suigintou's signature attacks, as the black feathers levitated alongside the single black feather already in the air, becoming as sharp as knives. As the feathers hovered around you, your small black feathered wings shrunk back to it's original size.

From seeing what was unfolding before her, Christy could see that she was staring at death in the face, as you looked her with your pink eyes and said, "Now, tell me this, dear sister; are you scared?" "Y-Yes." Christy replied, since it was that she could say due to the fear that gripped onto her a bit, but then she heard you say, "Good."

But then, just like that, you then commanded the hovering feathers to attack a single target; your sister, Christy. As she saw this, Christy's fight-or-flight instincts kicked into high gear, as she quickly ran out of your and quickly slammed the door shut, using it like a shield against the barrage of arrow-like feathers, as the lightweight projectiles hammered the wooden door like a jackhammer hitting concrete.
11322211.title: Big Mistake, Sis. Big Mistake!

113222111.content:
But suddenly, after 8 seconds of feeling arrow-like feathers hammering against the wooden door, Christy felt the barrage stop, almost as if you were trying to psych her out even more. At first, she it was over for now. But then, she heard your voice, as you spoke in Suigintou's voice and asked, "Are you still alive, dear sister?"

At first, Christy thought about keeping her mouth shut in hopes that you would interest in her. But then again, Christy thought that maybe you would listen to reason and stop attacking her. So in quick hesitation, Christy tried to reason with you, as she said, "Okay. I know what I did was overkill, I'm sorry, bro, I'm sorry."

Unfortunately for Christy, you knew that she was only saying those things to cover her own perky rear, so you ready another volley of arrow-like feathers, only this time, you aimed the feathers at the door hinges, as you spoke to Christy from behind the damaged door and replied, "I'm afraid that your apology isn't going to cut it, Christy. It is like you said 'simply saying sorry is not good enough', so I suggest you start running!" But as you said those words, Christy started running away from the door.

But before she could get a good distance from the door, you sent the black arrow-like feathers charging at the door hinges, causing them to explode the door off from the doorframe, knocking into Christy, as she tumbled down the stairs and stopped when she was only 5 to 6 feet away from the base of the staircase.

With the door no longer inhibiting you from getting some revenge on Christy, you extended your small black wings into a pair of large black feathered wings with a 4 and a half foot wingspan, allowing you to fly, as you flew out of your room and landed on the second floor railing with both heeled boots on the railing.

However, like a curious predator, you just stood there on the railing, crossed your Victorian-sleeved arms, and slowly paced back and forth on the railing, all while still keeping your pink eyes trained on your sister, as she got up from being knocked down the staircase. "Ugh. What have I done?" Christy said to herself, now understanding that turning you into Suigintou was just about the biggest mistake in her magic-using life.

Then, as Christy slowly got back up her own two, you spoke to your sister in Suigintou's voice and said, "I see you've had quite the adrenaline rush, Christy." Hearing the sound of your new voice made Christy to quickly get back up on her feet and face you. After all, you did just blew your bedroom door off from it's hinges and used it as a large projectile against her.

Thankfully, even though you were now the original Rozen Maiden herself, you still retained your compassion, since you weren't trying to kill Christy. So, you decided to make a deal with your sister, as you spoke to her and said, "However, unlike the original Suigintou, I am still able to show compassion."

Then, you began to slowly pace across the railing back and forth, still keeping your pink eyes still focused on Christy, as you spoke to your sister and said, "So, I decided to offer you a choice, dear sister. If you choose to submit, I will forgive you for these...transgressions. But..if you choose to resist, then I'm afraid it will only become much worse for you."

Those were the only options Christy was given. If she surrenders, you wouldn't attack her and forgive her. However, if Christy tried to resist, then basically, the shit was going to hit the fan a lot faster than she could say "Hocus Pocus". But the real question was what Christy's decision would be. Would she submit, or resist?
113222111.title: Never Mess With Suigintou

1132221112.content:
Normally, when it came to someone overpowering her, Christy would surrender to avoid death. But she wasn't going up against any powerful magic-user like her mother, she was fighting against you; her own brother, who she had intentionally transformed you into a fictional character from her witchcraft as a form of punishment, despite not knowing about Suigintou's powers and abilities.

"Submit?! First you tried to kill me with sharp feathers, then you launched a door at me, and you expect me to submit?! You might have become some dangerous doll from my witchcraft, but you're still my annoying little brother on the inside, and I am not going down without a fight!!" Christy yelled, letting her temper get the best of her, as she quickly grabbed a large steak knife to defend herself with.

Although you would hope that your sister would think smart about the gravity of her situation, you expected that her anger towards you would outweigh her conscience, as you slowly paced back and forth across the second floor railing, still keeping your pink eyes focused on Christy and replied, "Tsk tsk tsk, I thought that your own human conscience would outweigh the rage you have towards me, dear sister. But it seems that you still cling onto that fury of yours like it's a part of you."

"However, since you won't be swayed from your anger in an attempt for own survival...." You continued to speak, as you then summoned Suigintou's famed sword, as you held the sword by it's hilt in your right doll hand. From seeing that the sword, Christy saw that Suigintou's sword was easily 2 to almost 3 times longer, making the novice magic-user realize that she brought a knife to a swordfight, as you pointed the tip of the sword's blade at Christy and continued speaking, as you said, "...Then I'm afraid that a duel is inevitable. So, shall we perform a dance to the death?"

But before she could say anything, you leapt toward your sister, black feathered wings stretched out for flight and your sword ready to hit her. Thankfully for Christy, she learned how to fight with a sword a few months back, as she quickly used the steak knife to deflect your sword swing.

However, as you circled around for another attack, Christy knew one thing for certain; she needed a sword, and fast. But as luck would have it, your sister quickly remembered that she had a real katana sword given to her by her sword instructor, which happened to be displayed on a sword rack nearby.

But, just as you were about to hit your sister with Suigintou's sword, Christy quickly five out of the way and sprinted toward the sword display case. But then, as you got back up into the air and went for another strike at her, Christy quickly grabbed the katana, still in it's sheath, and used it to block your attacks, as you swung your sword at her multiple times at different attack angles, despite your sister deflecting each attack on her.

Suddenly, she quickly grabbed your right leg and threw you right into the kitchen, as you used your sword like a hook to stop your unexpected momentum. But as you got up onto the wooden counter, you saw your sister tank the sheath off of the katana, revealing the sharp curved blade that this type of sword was famous for.

But in the midst of this short break, both you and Christy looked at each other's eyes in a deadly standoff, just ready for the real fight and who would strike first, as the tension between these two siblings became more intense with each passing second. But then, in a split-second, both you and Christy grabbed your weapons of choice and charged at one another, as you flapped the black feathered wings to gain more speed, while Christy sprinted toward you.

But when your sword and your sister's katana clashed, the real fight began in a heartbeat. All that could be heard from both siblings' ears were the sounds of two swords repeatedly clanging into each other. But after 30 seconds into the fight, both you and Christy crossed swords, getting into an intense struggle of dominance.

But as the two of you continued to attempt to dominate one another, you accidentally pressed the power button on the stereo, causing the song "I'm Gonna Live Till I Die" by musician Frank Sinatra to blast out of the stereo's large speakers, as the two of you continued clashing swords at almost inhuman speeds, all while the oddly catchy song played in the background throughout the fight.

Then, about halfway through the song, Christ delivered a headbutt toward you, it didn't damage your new body, but it did stun you enough for Christy to grab you by the chest and hurl you at the wall across the room. As you got back up, you linked your doll neck a bit, and the two of you charged at each other once more. But then...
1132221112.title: An Intense Fight With A Rozen Maiden

Christy tells the truth, and tells her what she did to you
11322211121.content:
As you and Christy charged toward each other, all of a sudden, something happened; both you and your sister were blown away, slamming into two walls on opposite ends of the large expansive room. At first, you stifled to free your new body out of these invisible restraints, only to get even more pinned to the wall.

Then, you and Christy heard a familiar female voice that said, "What is going on in here?!" But as this happened, the two of you heard footsteps approached in between them, causing you and your sister to instantly recognize who it was, as the two of you spoke in unison and said, "Mom!!"

Your Mom's real name was Elizabeth Johnson, she about 33 years old, but with the appearance of a woman in her mid to late 20s, had green eyes, brown hair, and was around 6 feet 2 inches tall in height, along with a slenderly curvy and attractive body. But as you saw her walked inside with her jeans, T-shirt, and shoes on, you saw that your mother's arms and hands were tense, as they stuck out to the sides, indicating to you and Christy that this was her handiwork.

But as the stereo continued to play, she gave it a voice command and said, "Radio, off." This caused the stereo system to turn off by itself. "Now that this noise is out of the way, I want some answers out of you, Christine Johnson. Now." Your Mom said, since you knew that when she calls out Christy by her full name, your mother was dead serious.

In hesitation of being punished, Christy spoke to Elizabeth and said, "Look Mom, I'm sorry, I didn't mean to-" "Uh uh uh, I said answers, not apologies, Christine. Understand?" Your Mom answered, as the expert magic-user used her magic to keep Christy quiet, so your sister would do what your mother said. But shortly after your mom said her words to Christy, your sister nodded yes several times, so she could speak again.

And with a flick of her left wrist, Christy could use her own vocal chords again, as your mother looked at your sister with a pair of serious eyes and said, "Then answer these questions, Christine. First off, who is this doll beside me, and why were you two fighting? If you don't answer them right now, I will no longer teaching you anymore witchcraft. Understand?!"

Obviously, you knew that when your mother was talking about a doll, she was obviously talking about you. But you also knew that it was only going to get worse for your sister if she didn't answer Elizabeth's questions.

113222111212.content:
Judging from the looks of things, you could see that there was a lot more fear in Christy's eyes, especially when it came to dealing with your mother if your sister had done something really bad. However, out of all the times you've mess with your sister, you never seen Christy quite so scared before, meaning this was a very serious thing to her.

"Well, I...I, um..." Was all that Christy could say, since she wasn't that clear-headed when it came to her being in serious trouble. But since your sister was having some trouble explaining this whole mess she created, your mother does things up a bit as she yelled, "Well don't just stand there like a slug in the swamp, tell me what happened here!"

"Yes, dear sister, tell our mother what you have forced upon me." You said, as your mother heard what you said earlier, making the expert magic-user quickly realize something and said, "Mother? Sister? Wait a minute...." Curious as to why the sentient doll she held up called her and Christy "mother" and "sister", Elizabeth slowly turned her head to the right and looked up at you, while you tilted your head downwards and looked down at your mother with your pink eyes.

Now realizing who you possibly might be, your mother looked at you and asked, "Joe?" "Um, hello mother." You answered, as you blushed out of embarrassment from your own mother seeing you like this; not as a human male, but a female living doll with powers. As your black feathered wings shrunk down to their original size, your mother released from her magic grip, gently lowering you down onto the wooden kitchen counter, as the sword you used disappeared into thin air, since it wasn't in need of use for now.

But before your mother could hug you, she casted a spell aimed at Christy, saying the words, "Stasis Immobilie." From what you saw, the spell made your sister's body immobilized, unable to get up or do anything except for breathing and talking. Then, Elizabeth sat down on a stool nearby and embraced you into a hug as she said, "Oh honey, I'm so sorry I didn't come home any sooner."

"It's alright, mother. I forgive you for what has happened this day." You answered, as you hugged your mother the best you can, despite your new size. However, you oddly enough shed a few tears, even though it was rare for Suigintou to shed tears in the anime. But a few seconds later, the two of you let go of the embracing hug, as your mother leaned down a bit, putting her arm on the kitchen counter, and spoke to you with some concern in her voice and said, "But Joey sweetie; You're a 2-foot living doll, and I'm worried about you. What happened to you while I was out?"

Knowing that crying wasn't going to help, you walked up toward the tissue box nearby, and grabbed a tissue with your doll hands. Surprisingly, your doll hands and fingers could still move like regular human hands, as you wiped the tears away with the tissue. Then, you looked at your concerned mother and replied, "I know, mother. I am fully aware that I am no longer Joe Johnson the human male, but a Rozen Maiden doll. As for what has occurred that has made become what I am now, you can give your condolences to my dear sister."
113222111212.title: A Rozen Maiden For A Daughter

choices: Unfortunately, your transformation into a Rozen Maiden is actually permanent
Luckily, the transformation is only temporary, but for how long does it last?
1132221112121.content:
Shortly after you revealed to her that Christy made you into a Rozen Maiden doll, your mother looked at your mostly immobilized sister, who laid there on the floor due to the spell rendering her muscles useless. However, what made you concerned was how your mother looked at your sister, as if Elizabeth was looking at an enemy of hers, just waiting to get beaten to death.

Then, as your mother sat up from the stool and walked toward Christy, who was getting back onto her feet from the spell wearing off a bit, you looked at your mother with your pink eyes and asked, "Mother, why are you looking at Christy with the eyes of an animal?" "It's okay, sweetie. Mom's going to take care of it." Elizabeth answered, as her walking pace got a little faster, approaching your sister with increasing hostility.

But then, just as your sister got back on her own two feet, your quickly grabbed Christy by her clothes, slammed her back against the wall and yelled, "Why would you do this!?!" "You know why I did this; Joe became a big thorn in my side, and he so deserves it!" Christy yelled back, but was directly smacked in the face by your mother, as Elizabeth said, "But he's your brother, Christine! I would understand that if you used magic on some bully, but using that same magic on your own brother?! This is why we don't use our magic for revenge!!"

"I don't care about your stupid rules!!!" Christy shrieked, as that struck a nasty nerve in your mother's body, causing the expert magic-user to let out a bone-crunching punch, as it hit the wall with a loud thud, landing only millimeters away from your sister's face. It was then, that seeing how violent your mother can get, Christy now realized that she wasn't getting out of this situation in one piece, as your sister's heart started beating faster and faster, unable to keep herself calm.

Suddenly, in a fit of tears, Christy began to melt down in front of both you and your mother, as she yelled, "I'm sorry, I'm sorry,I'm sorry! ~long repeated sobs~" Seeing that your own sister still had a conscience, your mother felt a little sorry for yelling at her, as she calmed down a bit and said, "Don't apologize to me, Christine. It's your brother..er, sister you should be apologizing to."

Shortly after correcting herself about the status of your own gender, your mother hauled Christy over toward you on the kitchen counter, as the frightened girl looked towards you and whined, "I'm sorry!" "It is alright, dear sister. I forgive you." You answered, as you leaned down and patted Christy on the head a few times, hoping that she would calm down some.

However, despite your sudden and unexpected immersion into the world of magic and witchcraft, the real question still remained for you; Was your transformation into a Rozen Maiden actually a permanent effect, or is this transformation only temporary?
1132221112121.title: The Wrath Of A Mother's Love

choices: You intervene and stop the fight. After all, Christy is still your sister
You allow this conflict to continue, as Christy gets beaten up your mother
11322211121211.content:
Shortly after you accepted your sister's apology, your mother then spoke to the frightened Christy and said, "Now then, Christy. Since you changed Joey into what she is now, is there anyway to cure her?" Afraid of telling her own mother the truth, your sister started whimpering out of fear, frightened of what sort of punishment awaits her.

But in frustration, Elizabeth shook your sister in a slightly violent manner, as she yelled, "Answer me, Christine!" "It's permanent! It's permanent!!" Christy cried, as she started bawling again, now realizing that she wasn't going to go unscathed. "Are you saying that the spell you casted on your sister is permanent?! And you can't change her back, even if you wanted to!?!" Your mother asked, getting even more frustrated by this sort of news, as your sister let out repeated sobbing and answered, "Yes."

Hearing this form of bad news marked as the last straw for your mother, as she slammed Christy against a column nearby, pinning the teenager against it, and yelled, "Do you even realize that you just cursed your own brother to live out his days as a doll!?!" "I thought I could change him back, Mom! I thought I could have him stay that way for a couple of days then change him back!" Christy replied, now coming to terms with the consequences of her own actions, understanding that she could no longer revert the spell's effects.

But as you saw the events unfold in front of your pink eyes, you noticed how the tension between your mother and your sister was only going to get much worse if you don't intervene soon. But then again, Christy does kinda deserve what's coming to her after what she did to you. But should you really intervene and stop the fight, or just allow these chain of events to unfold?
11322211121211.title: No Longer A Man

choices: Have your mother make Christy into a Rozen Maiden doll like yourself
Choose another form of punishment for your sister
113222111212111.content:
However, despite what Christy had done to you and confirming to you and Elizabeth that the spell was permanent, the novice magic-user was still your sister, whether you liked it or not. Knowing that you had to stop this madness, you summoned Suigintou's sword back into your right doll hand, as you lifted the sword's blade just below your mother's jaw, right where her throat would be.

But when you raised your 2 foot sword toward your mother's neck, she felt the cold steel of the sword's blade on her skin, causing Elizabeth to turn head to the right and look down at you, standing on the kitchen counter, sword in hand, aimed at her throat. This made your mother greatly confused, as she looked at you with a pair of concerned eyes and asked, "Sweetie, what are you doing? Why do you have a sword near my neck?"

"Because I don't want you to harm her even further than you already have, mother." You answered in Suigintou's voice, hoping that you could convince your mother to stop. But then, Elizabeth then looked at you and said, "But honey, your own sister turned you into a living doll! Aren't you the least bit angry at her?!"

"Of course I am frustrated of Christy's actions towards me!" You yelled, raising your voice a bit. However, you calmed down by taking a deep breath, as you then looked at your mother with your pink eyes and said, "..But I understand that simply conflicting with my biological sibling will not revert the curse she has inflicted upon me."

Judging from how you were behaving, both your mother and sister were see that you were acting....well, surprisingly calm. Like Dr. Victor Frankenstein seeing his famed creation come to life, Christy was both curious and a little concerned at these unexpected side effects from turning you into a Rozen Maiden doll, since somehow your human soul and Suigintou's Rosa Mystica actually...fused together, allowing you to survive.

From hearing what you just said, your mother calmed down and let go of Christy, as Elizabeth slowly backed away from your sister by a few feet, giving the novice magic-user some breathing room. However, that didn't mean that Christy was going to avoid being punished, as you moved the sword's blade from your mother to your sister.

You looked at Christy with your pink eyes, along with a blank but serious look on your face and said, "But as for you, dear sister...." When she heard you say those words, Christy knew that you weren't done with her yet, as you looked at your sister with your pink eyes and said, "...You will answer for the actions you have brought upon myself, for no action is without it's own form of consequences."

Now the only question was this; what sort of punishment awaits your sister?
113222111212111.title: Giving Out A Second Chance

choices: Actually, it's another Rozen Maiden doll
1132221112121111.content:
Waiting for you to decide what her punishment should be, Christy gulped out of nervousness, not knowing what you were going to do to her. However, you decided on what your sister's punishment should be very quickly, as you looked at Christy with your pink eyes and said, "Since you have inflicted your novice witchcraft upon me, transforming me into what you see before you, I sentence you, Christine Johnson, to a lifetime as a Rozen Maiden doll like myself."

When you gave out her sentence, the look on your sister's face was both priceless and a sign that you chose the right punishment for her. Not to mention that you noticed your mother looked satisfied at how you were handling these sudden change of events in your life, despite that you were now a Rozen Maiden doll yourself.

Then, you looked at your mother and asked, "Mother, do you think you can handle carrying out my dear sister's sentence?" "Of course, honey. After all, I have a great amount of expertise on creating living constructs." Your mother replied, chuckling a bit as she then cast a spell on Christy, saying the words "Morpheus Unconscio", which happened to be a sleeping spell, causing Christy to become extremely tired and fall asleep.

With Christy unconscious, you and your mother discuss about Christy's punishment a little more, as you caused Suigintou's sword to disappear, seeing as how you have no need of it at the moment. As this happened, Elizabeth sat down on a nearby stool, putting her arms on the kitchen counter-like table, looking at you and said, "Now that Christy's preoccupied for the moment, my question is this, sweetie; If you're planning on making Christy into one of these...Rozen Maiden dolls, I need to know what they look like, what their individual powers are, and all the other stuff about them."

It was then that you quickly remembered that you had hardcover book on the Rozen Maiden series, both from the manga books and the anime series, as you then expanded your black feathered wings and took off toward your room to retrieve it. "Joey, where are you going?" Elizabeth asked, as she was wondering why you took off toward your room.

But a few seconds later, your mother saw you flew out of your doorless bedroom with a large hardcover book in your doll hands. "Mother, catch this!" You answered, as you used your momentum and threw the book toward your mother, as she quickly catched it in her arms.

But when you landed on the kitchen counter-like table, your mother looked at you and asked, "Honey, what did you just gave me?" But then, as your black feathered wing shrunk back to their original size, you turned around to look at your mother with your pink eyes and answered, "The book you hold in your arms, dear mother, is actually an encyclopedia on the Rozen Maiden. The information and diagrams this encyclopedia holds within it's pages should give you all the information you need on the Rozen Maiden dolls themselves and what their abilities and personalities are like. Thankfully for us all, the information inside the encyclopedia is written in the English language."

Now realizing that they have all the information they need, your mother looked through the Rozen Maiden encyclopedia with curiosity and was surprised how informative the hardcover book was, as she said, "Wow. I can't believe how much information they have on the other Rozen Maiden dolls, and I thought their existence was kept secret from the rest of humanity." "Mother, what exactly could you mean by 'their existence was kept secret'? Are you saying that the Rozen Maidens actually do exist in our own reality?" You asked, hearing what your mother said earlier.

However, since she had accidentally let the cat of the bag, your let out a short sigh, then looked at you and replied, "Look, I understand that you're curious about what I said just now, but I promise you, honey, I'll explain everything when we're with your sister. Okay?" You replied with a single nod, as your mother said, "Now then, did you decide on what kind of Rozen Maiden doll to turn your sister into?"
1132221112121111.title: The Fate Of Christy Johnson

choices: Let's go with another Rozen Maiden Doll

11322211121211112.title: So Many Dolls, So Little Time

choices: However, you decide to assist your mother in weaving the spell.
Leaving your mother to her devices, you explore the house a little.
Actually, let's just fast forward to after Christy was changed into Kanaria.
113222111212111121.content:
After searching through the book, flipping page after page, you stopped at a section of the book which involved none other than the second Rozen Maiden Doll and friend/rival to Hinaichigo, Kanaria. You remember her making her debut appearance in the second season of Rozen Maiden, known simply as "Rozen Maiden Traumend".

In appearance, Kanaria had the physique of a little girl, making her shorter than the other Rozen Maiden Dolls alongside Hinaichigo, complete with green eyes and greenish-grey hair, tied into two ringleted ponytails, while her outfit was a bright one, consisting of puffy orange pants and a long-sleeved yellow coat, with the sleeves puffed out and laced in white at the ends. The coat was tied in the front at the neck and the waist with brown ribbons. On the back of her coat she has another, larger sized bow, which consists of the same color of her coat. Also, she wears classy black shoes, along with being known to often carry a yellow parasol with orange lacing at the ends. In the anime, Kanaria is known to use her parasol frequently to "float" from place to place, a la Mary Poppins. Finally, the bangs of her hair are held to the side by a heart-shaped yellow hairpiece bearing a red rose in the center of said hairpiece.

Though as for her personality, you remember that Kanaria fancies herself as quite the stealthy prowler, making a hobby of watching the exploits of her Rozen Maiden sisters, usually through a pair of binoculars. Her cheerful, somewhat arrogant disposition makes her the ideal subject for many of the comedic episodes, and her personality mostly complements that of Hinaichigo, who eventually becomes her good friend and rival, which would results in them often debating on whose medium is "better", i.e prettier.

You couldn't help but smirk upon seeing the picture of Kanaria. After all, knowing your sister, she wasn't particularly fond of wearing brightly colored and very feminine clothes. "I take it that you've made your decision, judging from the look on your face, sweetie." Your Mom asked, which caused you to turn around to face her. From there, you walked around the book , then lifted it up so your mother could take a look at the pages before her as you answered, "Yes, mother. I believe this form would suit my dear sister best."

Her eyes scanning through the book pages, your mother then looked back at you and replied, ".....Okay, I think I can work with this. However, it might take me a little while to complete, dear." Out of assurance, you nodded yes in response, understanding the process.
113222111212111121.title: Kanaria

choices: Her physical size, having the looks and size of a doll.
Her clothes, where they changed into Kanaria's clothes.
Her eyes and hair, matching Kanaria's facial features.
1132221112121111211.content:
Although you understood by now that your mother was an expert in the magical arts, you couldn't help but offer her some assistance. At first, she tried to politely turn down your aid, but could see that your mind was made up already, so she simply shrugged and allowed you to help in weaving the spell.

Thankfully, the book had enough images of Kanaria from multiple angles to picture her in a 3-dimensional space. Of course, like any spell or curse, ingredients were required, as your mother carried you over to the other countertop in the kitchen, due to your now doll-like stature. Though as for what kinds of ingredients were needed in weaving the spell, you could only speculate due to your....lack of knowledge of the mystical arcane arts.

Fortunately, your mother was able to explain things in layman's terms. Seeing that Christy was still under the influence of the sleeping spell your mother casted upon her, you looked at your mother after she lowered you onto a coffee table, where you then asked, "Mother, shouldn't we wake her up?" "Joey sweetie, there is a perfectly good reason why I'm not undoing the Morpheus Unconscio spell." Your mother answered, where then continued and explained, "You see; In order for the spell we're conducting on Christy to work correctly, she needs to be in an unconscious state. Otherwise, there are......rather negative side effects."

"....What kind of side effects?" You hesitantly asked, feeling that this might not sound pretty, as your mother replied, "Deformed physique, phantom pain, and other unmentionable variables. After all, should we allow Christy to remain conscious during the spell weaving process, she would experience immense physical trauma during her transformation." Hearing what your mother had just explained to you, you were genuinely surprised at the consequences of an incorrect process when it came to weaving spells this advanced..

"....I see." You answered, as your mother nodded in agreement, then proceeded to commence the ritual for the spell, moving her hands and fingers, weaving what you could assume to be mystical arcane energy, as the magical essence flowed through her hands and in between the spaces of her fingers. The mystical energies swirled around Christy's unconscious form like a storm in an ocean, causing her body to float only a mere 3 feet above the floor.

From there, you witnessed what could only be seen as the magical energy being absorbed into Christy's body. Then, you noticed that the first thing to change on her body was....
1132221112121111211.title: Assistance From A Rozen Maiden

choices: Her eyes and hair, matching Kanaria's facial features.
Her clothes, changing into Kanaria's signature outfit.
Actually, Christy started to regain consciousness.
11322211121211112111.content:
What you witnessed before you could only be described as magic, as Christy's unconscious form started to glow brightly like a star, giving off an illuminating bluish hue. From there, you saw that your sister's entire body was literally shrinking, along with regressing in physical age, as you noticed that Christy was losing her physical maturity. Her breasts shrinking in size and becoming a petite flat chest, while she lost her near hourglass curve on her physique.

Once that part of the process was finished, she had the same physical dimensions as Kanaria, complete with a youthful and childish appearance, as she appeared to be around a mere 2 feet in height when standing upright. Then, as you turned to look toward your mother and witnessed her continuing weaving the spell, her hands and fingers moving in a fluid sweeping motion, like the ocean waves crashing against a rocky shoreline.

But when you turned your head to face your near-lifeless sister, you saw her skin and flesh becoming akin to plastic and ceramics, as the joints on her elbows, wrists, shoulders, pelvis, knees, and ankles becoming these ball joints, which are to give a doll or action figure various points of articulation for numerous different poses. Plus, you remember from an episode of Rozen Maiden Traumend when the dolls' clothes next became dirty, leaving Jun's sister Nori had to clean their clothes. This in turn revealed that the Rozen Maidens had ball joints for articulation and movement.

From there, you noticed that Christy's face now looked exactly like Kanaria's face, having this blank expression due to being unconscious. However, you knew that the transformation was just getting started, as the next part of Christy to change was....

From there, Christy's eyelids slowly closed shut, just as your sister's hair was the next thing to change.

At first, her hair color started changing colors at the base of her hair, which connected to her head. Then, the changing color spread down her hair until it became a greenish-gray hue. Along with change of hair color, your mother magically weaved the hair into a pair of ringleted ponytails, each positioned on the sides of her head, dangling downwards toward the floor due to her body levitating off the ground. Shortly after that, as you noticed Christy's now absurdly loose clothing from her former size dangling very loosely off of her doll body, it was there that....

11332.content:
Joe's POV


I woke up and I'm tied down to my sister's bed. I look around frantically. Where's Christy? She's going to pay! I just got a new girlfriend! I promised I would sit with her at lunch today! "Christy! Get your butt up here!" I yelled. I could hear her slowly coming up the stairs.

"Yes, little brother?" Christy whispered as she walked in. She looked at me and smirked. I glared at her. I tried reaching for the end of the rope and untying the knot. Christy looked at the rope, and it disappeared. I was still stuck.

Have you ever seen those really cool beds that fold up into the wall? Have you ever wanted one? I used to, until now. Christy had one of those beds. She folded the bed into the wall, and...
11332.title: Tied Down.

choices: The food mom made for me
A tube of mysterious red liquid
113322.content:
It was dark and I could feel the wall pressed against my body; luckily I wasn't hanging upside down. I would probably think I was alone in the room if it wasn't for the crackling of my sister. I called out to Christy but my voice was muffled by the wall. Her increase in laughter may it obvious that she could hear me. I tried my best to tell her to let me down but I could barely understand the mumbles leaving my mouth. Christy stopped laughing and it grew quiet… had she left me?

“Christy, have you seen Joe?” the voice that asked was none other than my mother. I struggled and tried to yell for help but suddenly blaring music played completely drowning out the little noises I made.

“He left, he said he had a date,” my sister’s lie entered my ear crystal clear despite the loud music.

“Oh, I see. I’m running late can, you put his food up?” Mom asked Christy and though I didn’t hear the response but I certain she just sent Mom off leaving the two of us here alone. I could only imagine what form a torment would follow, she already had tied me up and there was nothing I can do to escape. I sighed… I was at least glad that she had some good music playing.

The door slammed closed and the music stopped, my big sister was back. I moved and along with the light I saw Christy and in her hand was…
113322.title: She's still here....

choices: She stops me from eating the banana
I eat the banana and say goodbye to my manhood
1133221.content: She opened the bed up, folding it and me down from the wall. I was still tied to the bed and unable to move. Once it was on the ground, she entered my field of vision again. "Well, little brother, mom went to all the trouble of making a meal for you, so I guess you'd better eat it! Now, sit up and eat your lunch!" she said after muttering a few words in some language I didn't know. She just sat on the bed with me and handed me the tray as I helplessly sat up and slowly began eating. As I ate the corn, I noticed my hair growing longer, straighter, and blonder. Eating the soft mashed potatoes made my skin softer, and my body hair began falling out everywhere I could see. Still I was unable to stop eating. The chicken leg made my legs grow long and sleek, and the chicken breast gave me large boobs! As I look down in horror, I think that I may be a 38DD! Terrified I look down at the last item on the plate, and I just know what will happen if I eat the banana. I reach down for it without meaning to and......

choices: Eat the chowder and become fully female
Don't eat it and remain neuter for life.
11332212.content: She watches in glee and I watch in horror as I slowly peel the banana and begin eating it. Each bite takes a similar amount away from my manhood, percentage wise anyway. By the time I finish the banana, what was my manhood is now nothing more than a small hole to pee through, neither male nor female. My evil sister claps and laughs at me and the state I'm in while I sit there, motionless and in shock. "Okay, so now what should I do with you? Keep you as this....neuter, or take you all the way to being a girl? Gee, I can't decide, so I'll make you decide for yourself!" She heads out of the room again, leaving me sitting there motionless while she heads back down to the kitchen. She's only gone a couple of minutes before returning. "So here's the deal. If you eat the bowl of clam chowder, you'll become a full girl, if you don't then you'll stay like this, a neutered femme looking thing for the rest of your life. So, choose fast, before the soup cools and loses its' power!"
11332212.title: I eat the banana and say goodbye to my manhood

choices: You weren't happy being physically a girl.
113322121.content:
"Not clam chowder!" you thought and closed your eyes, but the smell of it pushed its way up your nostrils. Soon that had your mouth watering and even your very full tummy longed for the bowl's contents to join the other foods.

Was it irony, coincidence, or destiny that this was your favorite soup? Christy knew this would be pure torture knowing you would rather be a freak than let her magic control what you were to become. But she didn't know how strong you will was. So she waited watching the sweat break out on your forehead and your arms tremble as you tried to hold back.

It was no use. Your desire to taste the salty, milky nectar was too great. What exactly in your mind caused it, you weren't sure, but your hand slowly took the spoon and dipped it into the steaming bowl. As it rose towards your face, your head came forward, and your lips puckered as if to kiss the white mixture. A sigh escaped them as the heat was blown away, and your tongue lay flat in anticipation of the sensation that was about to happen.

With the first spoonful, the little neuter hole stretched at top and bottom. The flavor of the liquid made your hand return to dip again then empty the spoon into your mouth. Soon you had lost all control filling your belly until the bowl was empty.

As soon as the last slid down your throat, rumblings and cramps racked your abdomen as your insides twisted and changed into that of a girl. You wanted to scream, but instead your eyes began to water and sobs began.

Christy laughed, "Now you're physically a girl. You're my little sister, and you'll get to see what it's like to have your own clothes and keep your own diary instead of using mine. You must have always wanted it. So you should be happy."
113322121.title: Eat the chowder and become fully female

11333221112111.content:
Note from now on, much of the story is going to be from Christy's perspective, and the balance of power has now shifted, so that she is the one suffering not Joe.

Christy's POV

You groaned and opened your eyes, you were lying on your bed, confused you got to your feet, had you dreampt it? You opened the draw, the diary was still there, but it was no longer your brothers prison, it was simply an ordinary Diary, looking around your room, there was no evidence of last nights battle, your window was intact, all your books were on there selves, it was like nothing had happened. But something felt wrong, Christy could sense it, somethin was wrong, but exactly what, she didn't know.

She looked around again, and again, but nothing seemed different, and yet where was Joe? If it was all a dream then where was he? He couldn't have got free, unless he actually unlocked those powers, she paused to curse the fact, that by intheritance, he could techniqually be as powerful as her, as the magic genes were passed equally. He seemed however to lean more on book based powers, using books and there texts for energy, and manipulating them, he was perhaphs even a fictionmage or print mage, both of which could be very powerful, dangerous to her, slightly worried she decided to practise her skills a bit, she reached under her bed, only to find her speel book was gone.

Now worried, she felt a nagging sensation, she needed to test it out, "farbay, heock, tasss" she said, nothing happened, she tried again, and again, but nothing happened, something was blocking her powers, or rather someone, she turned and ran out of her room, down the stairs, and into the kitchen, there sat here mother eating breakfast, "morning Christy" she said. You had no time for such pleseantries, "wheres Joe?" she asked, "in his room," Mom replied, "he's started writting his first book."

Now really panicking, Christy ran up to Joes room, there he sat on his bed, holding her empty book, hard at work writing away, he looked up, "hello sis" he said coldly, "don't you hello sis me," Christy snapped, "what did you do? Why can't I use my powers? Where's my books? What..." Joes moved to silence you.

“Okay, I think you deserve an explanation,” Joe said, he got to his feet, and slowly walked up to you, “you imprisoned me, you enslaved me, you tortured me, your own brother, other one minor prank with a friend, and a stupid dare,” he spoke in a cold tone, and now without power, you felt afraid, “I’ve decided to repay the favour,”

“What?” Christy asked, “don’t you remember or understand you stupid jerk, your inside this book,” he held up the book, “but I’m with you?” you said afraid now, “yes but your also trapped in here, this book details your life, or at least your life over the next few days, it’s about you, in a sense I’m now all powerful, I can manipulate your life any way I want.”

You stare horrified, “no one has that sort of power,” she said, “well I do,” he replied, and I’ll prove it, he began to write something down, “and in mid disbelief in my new found power, Christy suddenly wet herself,” you stared “what?” you said, and suddenly you began to pee, looking down you saw your jeans turning dark, you tried to stop but you couldn’t you kept going till they were completely soaked, “what did you do?” you cried.

But Joe wasn’t finished yet, “and so she sudden found herself wearing a big disposable diaper, just like the little baby she really is,” you looked down, and found to your horror it was true, “why you brat,” you snarled running at him, but he simply wrote, still saying what he was writing, “she ran towards me, but like a little baby, she suddenly found herself unable to walk,” and with that you fell to your knees, and discover you could no longer remember how to walk, unsure you tried crawling towards Joe, but he raised his pen, and you were forced to submit.

“Okay you win, just change me back.” You said, Joe began writing, the diaper disappeared, and your clothes returned, you got to your feet, “what do you want?” she asked, “payback,” he said calmly, “I have a deal for you, you trapped me in a book for two days, in return you say in this book for the next two days.”

You didn’t answer, you just lunged for the book, but the moment you tried to touch it, the book just slipped through your fingers, like sand. Joe laughed, “Oh come one, even you should have realised I would have taken measures to stop you being able to simply do that.” He said, “However,” he continued, “that doesn’t change my offer, I have a deal for you, you stay in this book for two days.”

“I’m listening,” you said, so Joe continued, “in which time I put you through whatever torture or punishment I see fit, if you make it till the end of the two days, and you go free, I let you out, and you get to keep your powers, and I keep mine, and this whole event, we are considered even.” You paused, “and if I fail?” you asked.

“You lose your abilities, and have to except me as your superior and master for the rest of your life.” Joe replied coldly, “and trust me, if that happens you won’t live one day, where you don’t regret it,” “What are the rules?” you asked, Joe smiled, good question and he unrolled a list:
Rule One: You are forbidden to tell anyone about this, me, the deal, you being trapped etc.
Rule Two: Despite what is thrown at you, you have to continue your day, you can’t stop no matter what happens.
Rule Three: If I give you choice in the next forty eight hours, you have to pick on or you suffer both fates.
Rule Four: You may not try to escape the book, no spells, no potions, no prayers, no nothing.
Rule Five: If this becomes too much for you simply have to say I surrender and your free to go, but you will have lost.

After looking over the rules you looked up, “if you break any of them, you automatically loose.” Joe said, looking behind him, you saw that despite him putting the book down, lines were still appearing, clearly when no one was writing in it, the book simply recorded what happened. “Do we have a deal?” Joe asked.

“And if I refuse to say yes?” You asked, “Nothing,” Joe replied, “Nothing?” you replied unsure, “nothing will happen to you, your simply remain trapped in this book, till you change your mind,” He said, you had no other option, you put your hand forward, Joe shook it, “Deal” he said, “let the punishments begin.”

Now what day is it today?

122131122221.content:
It was another sunny winter day, you wake up to the radio blaring a catchy pop tune. You walk over to the vanity mirror, your once short curly blonde hair was now long, slightly below your shoulders, in long curls. You looked into your bright blue eyes and couldn't help but smiled. You were about to open your door when your mom walked in, "There is my baby girl!" she said.

"Mom..... I turn 13 today, I'm not your baby girl anymore!" you told her. You had grown out of your lisp.

"I know, but you will always be my baby girl." she replied.

Thats right, it had been 5 years since your sister turned you and your best friend into 8 year old girls. You had grown to enjoy being Kristina, and had many great years with your best friend Alyssa(steve). You were a late bloomer and on the verge of puberty. You noticed that your mom had brought a present in for you. You quickly open it and find a black lacy training bra, it was your first. You hugged your mom and walked to the shower. You had learned to be a girl quite quickly, your sister helped you out a ton, but it would be hard for you now that she had gone away to college, especially with whats to come.

You walked out of the bathroom, your hair in a towel, completely naked except for a fuzzy pink robe. You walked into your room and noticed your phone had gone off, it was a text from Alyssa, it said happy birthday and said she couldn't wait to see you today at school.

What kind of girl did you become?
122131122221.title: Several years later....

1221311222211.content:
You had become a rocker chick, it was one way you kept your old life with you while accepting your new life. You had pictures of several bands on the wall and a pink and black electric guitar that you learned to play. Steve learned to play the drums with his newly regained years as Alyssa and you two were trying to form a band. Your mom wouldn't let you color your hair or get more piercings besides the traditional girl ones.

It was almost time for school so you needed to get dressed. You felt the need to wear something special today, December 9, because it was your birthday. So you deviated from the usual jeans and put on a a pink and black stripped sweater dress. You also put on your new training bra which slipped on easily. You slid on some matching panties then the sweater dress. You slid some tights on that stopped mid calf. You then placed some black fuzzy boots (http://www.momdot.com/wp-content/uploads...). Even though you were a rocker chick you were still very girly. You straightened your hair and did your make up. You placed small black hoop earrings in your ears as well. You made sure everything was in your bag and then grabbed your coat and hoped in the car and your mom drove you to school.

You were in middle school, sadly, 7th grade to be exact. You had placed everything you didn't need immediately in your locker. You looked int the mirror and decided to put your hair up in a pony tail. So you finished re-doing your hair and closed your locker and saw Alyssa(Steve) walking in the door. You ran up to her and hugged her as she said happy birthday to you. You hung out for a while in the hall, several of your other friends came up to you and congratulated you as well. Many girls and many boys, you were quite popular. You had told Alyssa about your moms present, she said that she hopes you can experience mother natures present too. She said that when she got her first one a few months ago, it was the first time in a while she wished she was a boy again.

You went on through the school day quite happy, it was snowing outside and that made you quite happy. Finally as the school day ended you and Alyssa walked to your moms car....

You walked towards the car in the light snow chatting with Alyssa about your annual slumber party when you see Christy standing by your moms car, you run up to her and give her a hug. "Why did you come home this weekend?" you asked.

"I couldn't miss my little sister Joe become a teenager!" she said.

"I know I just love bugging you! How's the periods steve." she said as you all got in the car laughing. Alyssa rolled her eyes, and closed the door.

You passed the turn to get to your house, you were confused? It turns out the reason Christy picked you up is because your mom is allowing you to get a new hair cut/dye and a new peircing. You were so excited, you first got your hair cut. Your hair layered and bleached blonder, then the innermost layer was dyed pink. You enjoyed it a lot. Then you got an addition ear piercing in your right ear. You hugged your sister again and again, it made you so happy.

When you got home you showed your mom, she said she liked it but you weren't sure. You and Alyssa ran to your room to prepare for your party tonight. Your room had been redone a little, the hot pink shag carpet stayed, but the walls were painted black. You got a queen sized bed with large posts. Of course lots of rock and metal band posters were hung all over your room, as well as pictures of you and your friends. It was quite the large room, larger than your average bedroom, and it made you happy.

Your party was going to have you, Alyssa, and a few other girls who had come every year since you transformed. It was fun, but you weren't quite sure what was going to happen now that most of you had hit puberty, and you knew you weren't ready to date any guys yet. You had talked about it with Alyssa for a while and both agreed that you would deal with it when the time came.

The time for the party came.....

122131211.title: On the way

122131212.content:
Becky and Steve (Alyssa) walk you and Christy back to your house. The whole way home, Christy and Becky were talking amongst themselves about you and Steve, and how they were excited about having 2 new little sisters.

You and Steve didn't say much to each other the way home, you were both too distracted with the new feelings of your body. It was weird how everything around you was so much bigger than before, especially Christy who's hand you were holding. You were use to looking slightly down at her, but now you had to tilt your head high to see her.

You had tripped a few times trying to get use to your new height. You legs were a lot shorter, so you had to take twice as many steps as Christy and Becky to keep up with them. Thankfully, they saw the two of you having some trouble keeping up with them, so they slowed down slightly.

Another weird thing was your clothes. The pink bikini you were wearing a different experience than you were use too. All your life you had worn just swim trunks at the beach, and the feeling was slightly similar. But it felt like you were also wearing a shirt that was cropped at your chest, and if your shorts were too far up your legs.

The white sundress you were over it was a little better. You secretly liked how comfortable it was. It felt a lot more liberating than wearing pants, and while you walked, you sometimes twisted your hips a little to see it sort of swished around you.

But the height and the bikini didn't feel bad. It just felt different.

You looked over at Steve to see how she was doing. But unlike you, she had a frustrated look on her face and you could tell she wasn't enjoying any part of this. She mostly kept her gaze on her new sister Becky, glaring at her whenever she would look down to check on her. Becky giggled every time she saw Steve's 8 year old girl face with a huge frown on it.

Christy would also check on you every so often, and you think she expected you to have the same attitude as Steve, hoping to see you upset. She seemed surprise at your lack of pouting or complaining.

You all arrived at your house and Becky and Steve dropped you off at your door step. "Say goodbye to Becky and her little sister" Christy tells you. "Bye Becky. Bye Steve," you say at her instruction. The whole time Steve looked livid and gave a strained wave as Becky forcefully turned her around and began to walk to their house.

Christy lets you both in the house and begins to turn on all the light as the sun begins to go down. She walks you over to the living room and has you sit on the couch. "Okay Kristina, footsies up!" she coddled at you. You bring your tiny feet up and she begins to help you take off your sandals. She unlatches the straps and pulls them off, sand following it.

"Geez Kristina, you took the whole beach with you!" she said taking off the other sandal, more sand coming out. "Looks like it's bath time for you!" she has you jump off the couch and leads you upstairs to the bathroom. She walks you inside and has you stand on a little pink stool that you've never seen before. This was probably added to reality when she changed you into Kristina.

"Okay, arms up!" You raise your little arms up and she pulls off your sundress. Like with your sandals, sand falls off the dress and your body. You pout, seeing that there really is a lot of sand on you.

"Chwisty! I don't wanna take a baff!" you lisp out. She snickers at your childish complaint. "Awe! You sound just like a little kid!" You stomp your foot on the stool as Christy starts to undo the ribbons on your bikini. "What's wrong? Does my baby sister not wanna get clean?" You cross your arms as you stand there naked in your 8 year old body.

"Notta baby..." you mumble under your breath. Christy ignores your mumbling and start to run the water. When she felt that the water was warm enough, she picked you up under the arms and lowered you in the bath. You sat in the bath, arms still cross and still grumpy. Your sister smirked and opened the bathroom cabinet.

"I know what cheers little girls up.." she said as she pulled out a pink bottle of bubble bath. She walked over and added a little cap full to the stream and almost instantly, the bath was filled with sweet smelling, pink bubbles.

At first, you tried to stay angry. But as the bubbles got higher and higher, you began to giggle at the bubbles tickling your side. Eventually, you started to scoop the bubbles around you, trying to shape and mold them. Christy watched you as you got more and more into your bath. You didn't notice when she began to take her own clothes off as well and get in the bath with you.

You were surprised to see her jump in with you and asked, "Chwisty? What are you doing!?" She grinned and began to play with some bubbles as well. "What do you think I'm doing? I'm taking a bath with my little sister." Your shock didn't wear off as you sister had just gotten naked in front of you and climb in your bath.

Like with the bubbles, you tried to stay shocked at her, but again, you slowly warmed up to the idea to the point that you were both laughing and splashing each other by the end of the bath. You got disappointed when she said the two of you had been in there too long and needed to get out.

First Christy got out and quickly patted herself dry before getting you out and spending a little more time drying you off. She tickles you and plays with you the whole time and you can't keep yourself from the joy you got from it. She wraps your body and hair in fluffy pink towels and walks you out of the water logged bathroom.

She walks you back to your room that is still girl-ified and sits you down in front of a child sized vanity table. She begins to brush put your now long, blonde hair. After a few painful tugs and knots, she styles your hair into a loose ponytail.

She then walks over to one of your white dressers and pulls out a pink nightie. This morning, you were a little adverse to be wearing pink, but now looking at the nightie, it didn't seem to matter so much. You lift your arms as Christy told you to and she pulled it over your tiny body. The bottom hem fell just below your knees. Like your sundress earlier, it felt comfortable.

You and Christy glance over at the pink alarm clock next to your bed as it reads '9:00'. "Well Kristina, looks like it's your bedtime." You give her a puzzled look, "Chwisty, I don't have a bedtime!" She ignores you and beings to pull back your pink and purple sheets on your bed, moving away the decorative pillows to the side.

"Maybe 16 year old boys don't, but 8 year old girls do. Come on Kristina, I know your tired." As soon as she said that, you fight a yawn that begins to come out. "No...I'm not even sweepy..." You try and rub your eyes as the experience of today suddenly weighs down on them. Christy smiles at you and walks you over to the bed. For some reason, you don't really have the energy to fight it and you let her tuck you into bed.

She leans over and gives you a stuffed unicorn that was sitting in one of the stuff animals piles you now have. You think the pink and white animal is stupid, but accept it from her anyways and squeeze it into your chest. She leans over and gives you a little kiss on the forehead.

"Goodnight Kristina"

"Night Chwisty..." you drift off saying.

123232111.content:
Unfortunately for you, she never feels the need to change you back, and as a two year old, there wasn't much you could do but accept it. Life went on, and eventually you regained enough of your speech to beg your sister to change you back. Once again she refused.

Later on, you even tried telling your parents, but they just laughed at their younger daughter's wild four year old imagination. It was around that time that changes began to take place. Everything that you could recall from your original life transitioned from vivid memories to cloudy visions of some far off land viewed through eyes which most certainly were not your own. It wasn't through any sort of magic or coercion, just the natural human drive to adapt. The life that you were living, the one that you could see and hear and feel, the one that you experienced at the then and now, that life took priority. It was fun, it was free, and the ghost of your former self couldn't offer much that felt more enticing.

When the time came, you started school. Leaving home was a bit scary at first, but you made friends and were very outgoing. You went through all the usual girl things; ballet, girl scouts, choir. Though they didn't satisfy you for long. You still had some of your old male pride, and this led you to lean to sports instead, soccer in particular.

Yet more time passed, and you entered high school again. At this point, you were on the outside completely female in actions and manners as well as body. You were a tomboy, but that of course was never enough to reveal who you used to be. Life was great, and you were very close with all of your friends. You lived as if you had always been a girl, and nothing bothered you. Or almost nothing, you still held on to enough pride to refuse to date boys, at least for the time being. Your friends would always joke with you, you were such a smart, attractive, athletic girl, yet you wanted nothing to do with guys. They even mockingly suggested that you would go to the prom dressed in a tuxedo instead of a dress.

Your sister was quite pleased with how you turned out. You were always especially careful not to steal anything from her or invade her privacy. You also loosely held the grudge from being transformed, even if you weren't really all that concerned about it anymore.

Right now, it is late evening after another long school day. You're doing homework in the kitchen and you sister, who is spending the week on vacation from her job is over visiting.

"Hey Ema, I heard from one of your friends that a guy named Steve asked you out. You can't keep saying no." Cristy says with a giggle.

You roll your eyes and reply with a slight scowl "Oh go away, I'm only like this because of you."

"Well, I told you to stay out of my stuff. Besides you haven't seemed upset about it for the last few years now have you? I'm sure you'll turn over eventually and find yourself a nice man."

You run out of the kitchen but soon return with a pillow in hand. "Never!"

The pillow fight with your sister is great fun, and you two end the day with enthusiastic laughter.
