1241212.content:
You get up quickly to turn off the alarm next to your bed before rolling over and falling back down on the mattress. You feel very uncomfortable though, something is odd about your chest, it feels like you are laying on top of water balloons or something. You shuffle about trying to make the feeling go away as you are too tired to get up and investigate the strange feeling. Nothing works, so you roll over again on your back, but you can still feel some weight moving around on your chest. Without opening your eyes, you take your hand and brush it against your chest. You jolt up out of your covers immediately as a weird tickling sensation overcomes your whole body. This really gets you up and you finally look at yourself to see whats wrong. You become frightened a bit when you see two small bumps on your chest, but the fear slides a few notches toward confusion as you realize that you've never seen the shirt that you're wearing before. It was white and covered with hearts of various shades of pink. A thud echos off the floor as you leap out of bed and run to the bathroom mirror. All the while, you can't seem to shake the feeling that everything seems a bit bigger than it was yesterday. Finally you make it to the bathroom and flip on the lights. They shimmer before shining to their full brightness as you stare at the mirror trying to see what's going on. As the room lights up you see a strange face looking at you, the face of a young girl. She had a fairly intense look on her face, though her eyes contained a little sleepiness. She had her brown hair in two ponytails and was wearing the pink heart shirt you saw on yourself before, complete with two bumps that were rather prominently pushing up from under the shirt. As you kept staring you started to realize what had happened to you. Correspondingly, the girl before you slowly lowered her jaw and moved back.

You want to scream, you can feel the urge building up in you, but it just doesn't come. Without thinking, you tilt your head down and unsurprisingly you see a female body. There is no escaping it, you really are a girl. Just then, the door opens and you jump in fright before turning to see your sister Christy looking in. She is smiling.

"Hello 'Joe', freshening up in the bathroom?"

You can't believe it, your own sister did this to you. Even if you read her diary, this was just too much.

"Christy!"

You stop and hold your hands up to your mouth in disbelief at your high pitched voice. Not only were you a girl, but you sound a lot younger than 16. Christy just laughs.

"You like it? I can make it even better."

Your sister takes out a small white stick and waves it at you. Immediately you feel like singing.

"The wheels on the bus go round and round, round and round, round, the wheels on the bus go round and round all through the town!"

Your voice now sounds like that of a kindergardener.

"Christy stop it! What are you doing to me!"

"Well I made you twelve, gave you a girl's body, and just now I changed your voice to that of a toddler's. You had the nerve to snoop through my stuff and then you laughed when I told you how mad I was. I'm just getting even. You see, I'm a witch, but I'm still practicing. I figured that if you don't want to respect my privacy then I should get to practice on you."

Your tiny fists shake as you are about to yell at your sister, but you realize that she is right. It is your fault that you're like this.

"I'm sorry."

Christy walks up to you and hugs you.

"Good, but you're not off the hook... Josephine. I still don't know what I want to do with you. So, you're going to be a little cutie for a while until I decide your punishment. For now, just go about your business. Everyone still remembers you, they just know you as a twelve year old girl. You're even in the same grade. Magic is neat isn't it?"

Christy puts her hand to her chin and thinks for a minute.

"Speaking of school, it's about time you got over there. I'll fix your voice with my wand and then send you on your way. Bye bye!"

You sister takes out the stick again. She waves the wand once, then twice, and you suddenly feel yourself being pulled into the sky. You move so fast that you can't tell where you are or what is happening, and then you find yourself sitting in a desk.
1241212.title: lower.

12412122.content:
"Any questions?"

No one replies to the teacher's question.

"Well then, see you all tomorrow. Don't forget to hand in the rough draft for your papers."

The usual end of class shuffling begins as everyone gets up and begins drifting toward the door, everyone except the unusually young girl in the back of the room. She is none other than you. Apparently your sister was telling the truth, no one seems to care that there is a 12 year old sitting in class for high school juniors. As you sit there still a bit shaken up by discovering that your sister can perform magic, and by the fact that you are now a girl, someone comes up from behind and pats you on the back.

"Time for PE Joe, let's get down to the track for team practice. The coach was really mad last time we were late."

It's your best friend Steve. He used to be shorter than you, but now he's basically a giant. Somewhat reluctantly you get up and follow Steve out of the classroom. As you leave, he turns and says something to you.

"You look cute with your hair like that Joe."

Hearing that from your friend makes you shiver, you just stay quiet hoping that Steve won't say anything if you don't. After descending the school's main staircase and passing through the first floor hallway, you arrive at the locker rooms. However, you're not sure which one you should use. You're a girl, and your best friend just called you cute. Despite this, he's taking you to practice with the boy's track team. The only thing you can think to do is ask.

"Steve?"

You say looking up at him while trying to hold back your disgust at how unintentionally girly your voice came out.

"Am I a girl?"

Steve scratches his head.

"What kind of question is that. Of course you are, you are a twelve year old girl named Joe, just like I'm a sixteen year old boy named Steve. And now we're going into the boy's locker room to change. Does that sound unusual to you?"

Of course it sounded very unusual, but there was nothing you could do but accept the magically altered world made by Christy. You smile as if you had been joking, but the expression quickly fades to a look of defeat and confusion. Steve tugs your arm and both of you go in locker room. Some members of the team are already changing. They see you and don't care that there's a girl walking into the wrong locker room, but when you see them you feel strange. You can't explain it, so you try to ignore it and just get changed. As you look around for your locker though, you catch a glimpse of one of the more muscular guys taking off his shirt. You immediately stop and stare. It takes you a good 30 seconds before you even catch yourself doing it.

"Oh no! Did Christy, make me like guys?"

You didn't notice that Steve was behind you.

"Thinking about guys again Joe? It's too bad you can't change with the other girls and gossip with them, but I bet you like the view in here right?"

You ignore Steve, open your locker, and find an empty corner of the room to go change in. Before taking off your clothes, you unfold your track uniform, discovering that it is one for a girl. You sigh as you begin to change.

Just then you hear a tearing sound, like someone ripping a thick stack of papers in half. You look up and see a hole in the wall. Christy walks out of it and it promptly vanishes. She's jumping around and has a huge smile. This can only mean trouble.

"Go away Christy, I'm already tired of this. OK I was wrong to steal your stuff, but its not like I robbed a bank."

If you can't do that by the end of the year, you'll be a fairy forever. As the diary fairy, you also have a diary of course. But if a boy reads it,"

Christy waved her head from side to side slowly.

"you fall in love with him for a whole day and you have to help one extra girl for every guy you fall in love with."

You instantly try to protest, only to discover that you are frozen.

"I really like that idea, but I came up with another one just as good. This one will teach you a lesson too, but it's more for pure revenge. You will be a regular 16 year old girl at your school. If by then you're not an obvious couple, and that means holding hands and kissing, you become a girl forever and fall madly in love with your old self."

Christy's last idea was the most horrible thing you could imagine. If you could move, you would beg her for mercy, but it was too late for that.

"Now,"

Christy reached into her pocket and pulled out a coin.

"I just flip this, and we'll see if you'll be wearing fairy wings or a prom dress!"

The coin releases a metallic ping as it was shot into the air. You stand petrified, awaiting your fate. The silver coin seems to spin so slowly, and every time it reflected a faint flash of light into your eyes, you think that it is taunting you. The fear becomes so great that you lose track of time and don't notice when the coin lands in Christy's hands.

"Oh, you'll have fun with this choice. Bye bye Joe!"

Your sister waves at you as everything starts to go black. Within seconds, you are completely surrounded by a strange darkness. Although you cannot see anything in terms of the ground or things in the distance, you can still see your own body. You are still in the form of a 16 year old girl, but your clothes have changed. The only thing on you torso is a silver-grey Leotard. The tight clothing grips your breasts tight, making them seem larger. Your legs are completely bare, revealing your perfectly smooth and hairless legs. They ware so attractive that they manage to momentarily distract you from your transformation. At this point you just want to scream, but you begin to notice something strange on your back. You turn your head, and see some strange window floating behind you. You grab it, but then you can feel your hand. The window is part of you. You pull it closer to you and begin to realize what it really is. You now possess two pairs of transparent insect like wings, specifically, those of a dragonfly. They are quite large, about as wide as you are tall.

This is all too much, and you fall back and sit on the floor with your legs curled up to your chin. You want to cry, but you fight it, trying to prove to yourself that you're still a man. Just as decided to close your eyes and lower your head, the darkness around you begins to fade. Unsurprisingly, you are no longer in your house. A fuzzy beige color surrounds you, soon spots of other color begin to appear as well. The begin to solidify into shapes and objects. You notice that something isn't right. You stand up to examine an orange blob that is forming adjacent to you. You grab it, which seems to speed up the solidification process.

"What is this?"

You ignore your fairy girl voice and concentrate on identifying the object. It is squishy, light, and seems to have little glittery spots all over it. Sort of like, a candy.

"A giant piece of candy?"

It's true, you look around and notice that you have subconsciously began floating in a giant jar of colorful candy. It doesn't take long for you to understand what has actually happened. Christy's idea of a fairy must involve being small, so you have shrunk. This comes as a bit of relieve to you, as it would make it easier to hide from people, something you certainly planned to do. Before you can get out of the open jar, you hear the pounding of foot steps on the floor, and it is getting louder.

"Yes Dave that would be nice" you respond while trying to maintain eye contact with him. His eyes frequently glance down at your chest and you hate how predatory he is treating you.

When the waitress brings you a bottle of pinot noir you are able to relax a bit. Your mom's boss doesn't seem to want to talk about work with you are grateful for as you have no idea what your mother does on a day to day basis.

As the meal progresses you start to feel the warming effect of the wine and he slowly inches his chair closer to you. Taking off the suit jacket becomes a necessity but the sight of you in just a sleeveless coral blouse draws even more interest from Dave. He seems to be getting a little tipsy as well and takes any chance to touch you or hold your hand briefly.

You look over to see Anne watching all of this intently with smirk on her face. She needs mom to keep her job as much as you do, why is she allowing this to continue?

You shouldn't have been surprised but you couldn't help it. Something about seeing your dad in a casual dress, hair curled with immaculate makeup just got to you. Whats worse, he didn't look like a man in a dress either, his features had been smoothed and made more feminine, his height had decreased and his body was curvy in all the right places. He was stirring a pot over the cooker and the smell was amazing.

"Dad! What's happened?" you exclaimed.

Your dad turned frantically towards you. "Shhhh." he brings a finger over his lips. "Joe what are you doing, you know that your mom doesn't know that I don't make my own sauces for the meals." He gestures at the empty sauce packets on the kitchen top. "What she doesn't know won't hurt her."

You just stare at this harrowing scene. Your dad, fully feminized and cooking dinner for the family. Just before you scream however you jump as a hand pats you on the shoulder. Looking around you see that it belongs to Christy who is wearing the same huge grin she's had on all day.

"You look stressed lil' bro, how about we go and relax and leave dad to cook dinner. Mom will be back from work soon." You allow yourself to be led from the kitchen into the living room and sit on the sofa, feeling numb, not so numb as to forget to cross your legs as you sit however. Christy sit across from you and watches you.

"Why?" you finally mumble, unsure of what else to say.

"Come on Joe, you know why. I've told you all day why and you need to get used to it. Things are going to be like this for a long time." she replies.

You look her in the eye, "Okay then, how? How are you doing this?"

"Magic lil' bro, magic."

"Really? You expect me to believe..." you stop as Christy wafts he hand lightly in your direction and you feel a odd softness on your body. You look down and gasp to see your outfit has changed from the sweater dress and tights to a white top with a pink floral skirt. Look down even further you see a pair of white ballet flats on your now tiny feet. https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736...

"Need any more proof?" Christy asks, stating to move her hand again.

"NO! No thats enough, I believe you."

"Good. Then you understand I am in full control baby bro,"

"So you mean to tell me you've had magic powerful enough to change the entire world and you decided to make men weak, feminine and submissive rather than trying to make the world a better place like dealing with poverty and starvation?"

"Its the same thing bro. With women in charge of the world, poverty is almost gone and starvation is extinct. African nations are among the richest in the world and all it took was to put men in dresses. Don't you see Joe, its all perfect now. The old world we lived in was so much worse than the one we live in now."

"But I'm a second class citizen. All that is expected of me is to look pretty and look after children."

"Aren't you lucky then for having so few responsibilities? You should be thanking me. All the other boys seem happy with the new setup and they haven't had half of the advantages you had. I made you cute, petite, an excellent dancer and gave you Marie as a girlfriend. I know how much of a crush you had on her."

"That was before she looked like a football player." you say exasperated.

"So your telling me you don't want a big strong girlfriend to look after you then?" Christy says, raising an eyebrow. "Cos I can get rid off her just like..."

"No, thats not what I meant." you say quickly, unsure whether you said so because you didn't want anymore reality changes or if you actually liked Marie. You take a deep breathe. "Look, is there any way things can go back to normal?"

"Umm nope." She says curtly.

"Okay. So are you going to make anymore changes?"

"I might do, I was toying with the idea of men getting pregant and giving birth to kids as well raising and breast feeding them." She gestures at you new assets on your chest. "But that might take a while, my magic takes time to recharge"

You decide to ignore the male pregnancy comment and focus on what she said about her magic. "So you mean you can't change things all the time?"

"No. Big changes like the ones this morning really took it out of me as it affected the whole world but making you able to dance well, shrinking you and changing your clothes took little effort."

"Huh." you say, genuinely intrigued.

"Anyway, good talk baby bro." Christy says rising to her feet. "Its good you come to terms with things. I'll see you at dinner."

"So since you sad that you made changes to benefit me."

Christy stops. "Yeah. I didn't just do this change to make you unhappy you know. I'm not a psychopath."

You restrain yourself at this last comment knowing it won't help you if you annoy her. "I was wondering if you would be open to requests to make things better for me again in the future?"

"I might be. But that depends on how well you respond to what I've given to you already. We'll see in the future." At this. Christy leaves the room and heads upstairs leaving you alone on the couch with your thoughts.

"There must be a way out of this." you think. "Maybe I can trick her somehow with one of the requests but that would involve playing along for who knows how long. Is it worth it?"
